problems.ins:
ğŸ‚ I prefer to be with people who have the same ideas and tastes as myself. 
ğŸ‚ I get very upset when things around me arent in their place. 
ğŸ‚ Any solution to a problem is better than remaining in a state of uncertainty.

ğŸ‚ I don't like to go into a situation without knowing what I can expect from it. 
ğŸ‚ I don't like situations that are uncertain.

ğŸ‚ I prefer things to which I am used to those I do not know, and cannot predict. 
ğŸ‚ I like to have the responsibility of handling a situation that requires a lot of thinking

ğŸ‚ I am anxious that I will fall short of my responsibilities and obligations. 
ğŸ‚ I often think about the person I an afraid I might become in the future. 
ğŸ‚ I often worry that I will fail to accomplish my academic goals. 
ğŸ‚ I am more oriented toward preventing losses than I am toward achieving gains. 
ğŸ‚ I frequently think how I can prevent failures in my life.

ğŸ‚ I typically focus on the success I hope to achieve in the future. 
ğŸ‚ I frequently imagine how I will achieve my hopes and aspirations. 
ğŸ‚ I see myself as someone who is primarily striving to reach my [ideal self]-to fulfill my hope, wishes, and aspirations.

ğŸ‚ I am confident I get the success I deserve in life. 
ğŸ‚ I feel depressed. When I try, I succeed. 
ğŸ‚ I do not feel in control of my work. 
ğŸ‚ I am capable of coping with most of my problems.

ğŸ‚ The certainty of death makes life meaningless. 
ğŸ‚ Getting old worries me. 
ğŸ‚ The sight of a corpse deeply chocks me. 
ğŸ‚ I often think I may have a serious disease.

ğŸ‚ Equal distribution of resources is a possibility for our society. 
ğŸ‚ It is unfair to have an economic system which produces extreme wealth and extreme poverty at the same time.

ğŸ‚ To get ahead in life, it is sometimes necessary to step on other groups. 
ğŸ‚ If certain groups of people stayed in their place, we would have fewer problems. 
ğŸ‚ Sometimes other groups must be kept in their place.
